alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 1:04PM PST until February 25 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 1 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
